data.title: Aven, Shows Leighton & Harvey who appeared in the roles of Rosalind and Orland. As You Like It. British stars Margaret Leighton and Laurence Harvey are seen in the starring roles of the famous Shakesp
data.meta_description: Stock image 5513-19720433: ***** Divorge Suit - It is ***** that Mr. Max Reinhardt, the publisher, is seeking a divorce from his wife, actress Margaret Leighton, sitting actor Laurence Harvey. This picture taken during a performance of As You Lie It at the Memorial Theatre, Stratford-on-Aven, Shows Leighton & Harvey who appeared in the roles of Rosalind and Orland. As You Like It. British stars Margaret Leighton and Laurence Harvey are seen in the starring roles of the famous Shakespearean play. It is reported that publisher Max Reinhardt is seeking a divorce from his wife Margaret Leighton. December 1, 1954.
